short_summary: Health Canada is seeking up to two (2) System Auditors and up to four (4) Web Designers to support web content accessibility projects across the HPFB on an as and when required basis. Task Authorizations (TA) will be issued against the Service Outline Agreement to support health initiatives Security Requirement: Common PS SRCL #6 appliesMinimum Corporate Security Required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS)Minimum Resource Security Required: Reliability
description: Health Canada is seeking tomodernize business efficiency and integrate IT systems with departmental strategies. Web technologies is central to almost every aspect of Health Canada business, as it enables and supports a more efficient delivery of programs. Health Canada has been faced with increasing challenges to health products regulation; as such, HPFB must ensure IT projects compliance with web content accessibility guidelines and Health Canada commitments. In pursuit of modernizing business efficiency and integrating IT systems with departmental strategies, HPFB will invest in various projects that focus on innovative web application development, and post-implementation assessments System Auditors and Web Designers will be required over a period of three (3) years during to support HPFB projects by delivering analysis and development service on an agile basis

full_summary:
# Health Product and Food Branch: System Auditor/Web Designer for Web Content Accessibility

## Tender Details

### Reference Number
PW-22-01016105

### Amendment Number
1

### Solicitation Number
1000246078

### Publication Date
2022-12-06

### Tender Closing Date
2022-12-21T23:00:00

## Tender Description

The Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) of Health Canada is seeking a System Auditor/Web Designer to support web content accessibility projects across the organization. This requirement is open exclusively to TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories:

* Up to Two (2) level 2 System Auditors
* Up to Four (4) level 2 Web Designers

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* Brascoupe Professional Services Inc. and Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc., in Joint Venture
* Cistel Technology Inc.
* COMPUTACENTER TERAMACH INC.
* Deloitte Inc.
* HELM'S DEEP CONSULTING CORP., MESSA COMPUTING INC., THINKPOINT INC., IN JOINT VENTURE
* iFathom Corporation
* Leverage Technology Resources Inc.
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* Nisha Technologies Inc.
* Onaki Création S.E.N.C., IBISKA TELECOM INC., in Joint Venture
* Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
* Randstad Interim Inc.
* SoftSim Technologies Inc.
* Spectra FX Inc.

The description of work includes:

* Modernizing business efficiency and coordinating Information Technology (IT) systems with departmental strategies
* Ensuring IT projects' compliance with web content accessibility guidelines and Health Canada commitments
* Investing in various IT projects to support the development and implementation of initiatives and projects
* Delivering analysis and development services on an agile basis for a period of three (3) years

## Security Requirements

* Common PS SRCL #6 applies
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Reliability

## Contact Information

* Name: Shawana, Beverly
* Email: beverly.shawana@hc-sc.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-371-3765

Note: The above text has been reformatted and rewritten to be more professional and concise
